title: Enablement team model
summary: A coaching-focused team that accelerates adoption of patterns through pairing, workshops, and templates.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Patterns fail when teams are told to change but not supported in how to change.
whenNotToUse: Only a small group will build on the platform

gotchas: Enablement becomes training-only and loses feedback loops
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Measure adoption and outcomes; treat enablement as continuous, not one-time training.

complexity.rationale: Mostly people and process; high leverage.
complexity.skillDemand: Coaching, facilitation, and architecture translation skill.
complexity.operationalDemand: Lowâ€”indirect operational impact via better adoption.

realWorldExample.approach: Paired with teams to ship first integrations and captured lessons into templates.
realWorldExample.outcome: Faster adoption and fewer divergent implementations.
